snippet: A New York police official says terrorists are now often streaming live video and pledging allegiance to the Islamic State during their attacks....
lead_paragraph: A New York police official says terrorists are now often streaming live video and pledging allegiance to the Islamic State during their attacks.

headline.main: New Trend for Terrorists: ‘Dying Live’ as Attacks Unfold
